classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and implementation of generative AI solutions, including RAG and LLMs. It also mentions building and managing production-grade software systems around these technologies using tools like Python and Azure, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
